Name: Rum & Raisin Alexandra
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker.
Review: Forgo the ice cream and try this creamy, quaffable, alcoholic dessert.
History: Created in 2003 by Ian Morgan, England.
